mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN (#{dateUnit}='DATE') THEN DATE(insDte) WHEN (#{dateUnit}='MONTH') THEN MONTH(insDte) END AS date, CASE WHEN (#{column}='speed') THEN ROUND(AVG(speed),2) WHEN (#{column}='mileage') THEN ROUND(AVG(fuel),2) WHEN (#{column}='distance') THEN ROUND(MAX(driving_distance + 0),2) WHEN (#{column}='tripDistance') THEN 'no data' WHEN (#{column}='tripValue') THEN 'no data' WHEN (#{column}='idling') THEN 'no data' WHEN (#{column}='acceleration') THEN 'no data' END AS value FROM mqttdata WHERE obdNo= ( select obdNo from carInfo where carNo=#{carNum}) AND CASE WHEN (#{dateUnit}='MONTH') THEN insDte BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startDate},'/01') and CONCAT(#{endDate},'/31') ELSE insDte BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} END GROUP BY date

SELECT CASE WHEN (#{dateUnit}='DATE') THEN DATE(insDte) WHEN (#{dateUnit}='MONTH') THEN MONTH(insDte) END AS date,
COUNT(distinct tripId,obdNo) AS value FROM mqttdata
SUM(tb.dist) AS value FROM (select Max(m2.driving_distance+0) as dist, insDte From mqttdata m2 group by m2.tripId, m2.obdNo) tb
SUM(tb.maxFuel - tb.minFuel) AS value FROM (select Max(m2.fuel) as maxFuel, Min(m2.fuel) as minFuel, insDte From mqttdata m2 group by m2.tripId,m2.obdNo) tb
AVG(tb.avgfuel) AS value FROM (select AVG(m2.fuel) as avgfuel, insDte From mqttdata m2 group by m2.tripId,m2.obdNo) tb
WHERE CASE WHEN (#{dateUnit}='MONTH') THEN insDte BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startDate},'/01') and CONCAT(#{endDate},'/31') WHEN (#{dateUnit}='DATE') THEN insDte BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} END GROUP BY date
